files.patch:
@@ -108,1 +108,4 @@ - *

+ * @implNote The default implementations of {@code BreakIterator} will perform the equivalent + * of calling {@code setText("")} if the text hasn't been set by either + * {@link #setText(String)} or {@link #setText(CharacterIterator)} + * and a boundary searching operation is called by the {@code BreakIterator} instance.
